Package west.wegovdemo

Interface Summary
TopicOpinionAnalysis This is the basic functionality provided by topic-opinion analysis to other WeGov components.
TopicOpinionInput This interface represents inputs passed by WeGov components to the topic-opinion analysis.
TopicOpinionOutput Output of WeGov topic-opinion analysis.
 

Class Summary
OfflineDemo This class demonstrates the functionality of topic-opinion analysis in an offline example.
OfflineDemoInput This class demonstrates the functionality of topic-opinion input in an offline example.
SampleInput  
TopicOpinionDocument This class serves a small container for per-document data in results returned by topic-opinion analysis: topic-specific scores and opinion weights.
WegovRender Small helper class that contains functions for rendering results of topic-opinion analysis It makes an (almost) complete printout of the results returned by topic-opinion analysis.
